Topic Summary: Appeal against the PAYE/USC Balancing Statement of April 2017, where deductions where USC was payable in respect of payments made by DSP in respect of his pension entitlements from his employment in Waterford Glass
Tax Legislation: Section 951AM Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (amended), Section 951AM(1) Taxes Consolidation Act 1997  Section 531AM(2) Taxes Consolidation Act 1997, Section 48B of the Pension Act 1990 (amended),
